sources.title: The Deadly Companions (WESTERN CLASSIC FILMS German Complete, Western FILMS IN FULL LENGTH)
The Deadly Companions (1961) SAM PECKINPAH
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Director: Sam Peckinpah,  in his feature film debut
Stars: Maureen O'Hara, Brian Keith, Steve Cochran
üçïTHE CARY ROAN SIGNATURE EDITIONüçï
It's an unholy alliance when a former Union Army sergeant and a pair of trigger-happy outlaws escort
a dancehall hostess through dangerous Apache territory. Featuring intense performances and the early brilliance of Sam Peckinpah, this film set the tone for his legendary career in Westerns and American cinema.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

If you love Sam Peckinpah Westerns, Maureen O'Hara movies, Brian Keith classics, or the rugged action of 1960s Western films, this is one you can't miss. The Cary Roan Signature Edition on PizzaFLIX brings this essential Western to life in beautiful quality.

#SamPeckinpah #WesternMovies #MaureenOHara #BrianKeith #SteveCochran #PizzaFLIX #CaryRoanSignatureEdition #ClassicWesterns

sources.title: The Deadly Companions
sources.description: Title: The Deadly Companions Summary: An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it by escorting the funeral procession through dangerous Indian territory. Directed by: Sam Peckinpah Actors: Production Company: Path√© America Release Date: 16 February 1962 (Sweden) Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1 The Civil War Yankee sergeant Yellowleg saves the cheater Turkey from hanging after a card game, and together with Turk's gunslinger buddy Billy Keplinger, they ride together to Gila City with the intention of heisting a bank. When other bandits rob a store, Yellowleg shoots at the outlaws and accidentally kills the son of the cabaret dancer Kit Tilden and the grieving woman decides to bury her son in the town of Siringo in Apache country where her husband is buried. Yellowleg Enlists Billy and Turkey to escort Kitty and the coffin through the dangerous land.

sources.description:
An Unholy Alliance! 
An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it by escorting the funeral procession through dangerous Indian territory.

Original title: The Deadly Companions (1961) Also Known As: Trigger Happy

This film is available with English, French & Spanish audio, and subtitles in many languages.

metadata.Plot: The Civil War Yankee sergeant Yellowleg saves the cheater Turkey from hanging after a card game, and together with Turk's gunslinger buddy Billy Keplinger, they ride together to Gila City with the intention of heisting a bank. When other bandits rob a store, Yellowleg shoots at the outlaws and accidentally kills the son of the cabaret dancer Kit Tilden and the grieving woman decides to bury her son in the town of Siringo in Apache country where her husband is buried. Yellowleg Enlists Billy and Turkey to escort Kitty and the coffin through the dangerous land.
